description: Channel pathway, follows the canal from Okanagan Lake to Skaha Lake. Short easy ride or can be walked or even used for jogging. It's just over 6 kilometers from one end to the other.Bike shop / rentals: Freedom Bike Shop Accomodations: Summerland Resort
directions: Park at either in. There is a parking lot off Skaha lake road in the south end or near the SS Sicamous restaurant in the north end.
title: Penticton Channel Path
